DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of ZD6474 in patients with NSCLC after Failure of Prior Platinum-based Chemotherapy.
DOC.brief_title: This Study is to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of ZD6474 in Subjects With Non-small Cell Lung Cancer.
DOC.criteria: Histologic or cytologic confirmation of NSCLC (locally advanced or metastatic, IBIV) Failure of firstline platinumbased chemotherapy Mixed small cell or nonsmallcell histology Bronchoalveolar carcinoma Prior chemotherapy or herbal preparations must be discontinued more than 4 weeks before the start of study therapy (6 weeks for nitrosoureas, mitomycin and suramin) Prior treatment with docetaxel
